title: WTB Hal Chase, current needs list attached
author: realbigfatdog

posts.post_title: WTB Hal Chase, current needs list attached
posts.post_content:
Hal Chase wanted list:

These are the current cards still needed for my Chase master set. If you have one that you're looking to sell, let me know.

1906 Police Gazette
1907 Police Gazette, Chase/ Armbruster
1908-09 Rose Co. Postcards
1909 E270-2 Colgans Tin Tops
1909 E92 Crofts Candy
1909 E92 Nadja
1909-10 German Baseball Stamo
1909-10 D380 Clament Bros.
1909-12 Sweet Cap. Domino Discs (both ears)
1910 E104-3 Nadja
1910 E105 Mello-Mint
1910 Colorized Portraits (strip card)
1910 W-UNC strip card
1910-13 T215 Red Cross (w/ Trophy) type 1
1911 E300 Plows Candy
1911-14 T216 Mino Cigs (portrait)
1911-14 T216 Mino Cigs (fielding)
1911-14 T216 Virginia Extra (portrait)
1911-14 T216 Virginia Extra (fielding)
1912 Baseball Bats Candy
1912 T215 Red Cross Type 2
1914 Coupon Cigs Type 2, Buffalo throwing
1914 Coupon Cigs Type 2, Buffalo portrait
1914 Coupon Cigs Type 2, Chicago trophy
1915 D303 General Baking (fielding)
1915 D303 General Baking (portrait)
1915 D303 Mothers Bread (fielding)
1915 D303 Mothers Bread (portrait)
1915 T214 Victory Tobacco (fielding)
1915 T214 Victory Tobacco (portrait)
